```{r}
install.packages("caTools")
library(caTools)
set.seed(3000)
splittingData <- sample.split(stevens$Reverse, SplitRatio = 0.7)
TrainingData <- subset(stevens, splittingData == "TRUE")
TestingData <- subset(stevens, splittingData == "FALSE")
install.packages("rpart")
library(rpart)
install.packages("rpart.plot")
```
